name: R&D domestic employees, by selected industry, sex, and R&D occupation, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2019

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2020 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2019.
